perturbation.original_text: 7.   EMPLOYEE STATUS.  Nantz will be a full time Ashworth employee rather than       an independent contractor.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.   EMPLOYEE STATUS. Nantz will be considered an independent contractor for all tax and legal purposes, despite performing services similar to those of a full-time employee.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly states Nantz is a full-time employee. The modified text contradicts this by classifying him as an independent contractor, creating uncertainty regarding his employment status and related obligations/benefits.

perturbation.original_text: 1.   ENDORSEMENT.  Subject to the terms and conditions hereof, Nantz      Communications grants to the Company the Endorsement throughout the world      during the Term in connection with the advertisement, promotion and sale by      the Company of Ashworth Products except in connection with Premium      Programs.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.   ENDORSEMENT.  Subject to the terms and conditions hereof, Nantz      Communications grants to the Company the Endorsement throughout the world      during the Term in connection with the advertisement, promotion and sale by      the Company of Ashworth Products; however, such endorsement shall be limited to use in print advertising only, and not in television or online campaigns.
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants a broad endorsement. The modified text contradicts this by limiting the endorsement to print advertising only. This creates ambiguity regarding the scope of the endorsement.

perturbation.original_text: 26.  JURISDICTION AND VENUE.  For the purposes of any dispute arising hereunder,      jurisdiction and venue shall lie in the appropriate court in California.
perturbation.changed_text: 26.  JURISDICTION AND VENUE.  For the purposes of any dispute arising hereunder related to intellectual property rights, jurisdiction and venue shall lie in the appropriate court in California. For all other disputes, the parties agree to binding arbitration in New York.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies California for jurisdiction and venue for all disputes. The modified text specifies California for intellectual property disputes, while mandating binding arbitration in New York for all other disputes. This introduces contradiction concerning dispute resolution mechanisms.
